item.title: [Delta] Weird special attack question [2specced] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

hey well i have a problem with adding special attacks

i have added the cases in special.java as u can see i add it rite here

[code]import java.io.*;

public class special {
public void loginSpec(client c, int item) {
switch(item) {
case 1215:
case 1231:

c.l33thax(12323);
c.l33thax(7574);
c.l33thax(7599);
c.l33thax(7549);
c.l33thax(8493);
c.l33thax(7499);
break;

	default:
		c.removeSpec(12323);
		c.removeSpec(7574);
		c.removeSpec(7599);
		c.removeSpec(7549);
		c.removeSpec(8493);
		c.removeSpec(7499);
	break;
}

}

public void needSpecial(client c, int item, int target) {
if(target != 3) {
return;
}
switch(item) {
case 1215:

c.l33thax(7549);
c.l33thax(8493);
c.l33thax(7499);
break;[/code]
as you can see i want to add a special attk bar by item 14779 , but it wont pop up in game…
i tested it on other source and it worked …
anyone can help me with it i rep++
